definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack
war on all sides (idiom); fighting from all four quarters
war on all sides (idiom); fighting from all four quarters

sentences.english: They are not just ancient history.
sentences.chinese: 從這個角度說，十字軍東征不僅僅是古代史。

sentences.english: I'll also look in detail at the risks and rewards of crusades and jihads.
sentences.chinese: 我同樣會展示十字軍東征和聖戰的風險和回報的細節。

sentences.english: The crusades have left a deep mark on the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 十字軍東征給中東留下了不可磨滅的印象。

sentences.english: When the king left on the Second Crusade he appointed Suger regent and left him in charge of the government.
sentences.chinese: 國王在第二次東征前任命蘇傑攝政和負責政府。

definition: to go on a punitive expedition
Chen Jiongming (1878-1933), a leading warlord of Guangdong faction, defeated in 1925 and fled to Hong Kong
Hunan army, irregular force formed in 1850s to fight the Taiping heavenly kingdom rebellion
United Front (either of the two alliances between the Guomindang and the Communist Party, 1923-1927 and 1937-1945)
to collaborate/to join forces/to effect a junction
Liu Yu, founder of Song of the Southern dynasties 劉宋|刘宋[Liu2 Song4], broke away from Eastern Jin in 420, reigned as Emperor Wu of Song 宋武帝[Song4 Wu3 di4]
